titleStmt.title: The humble petition and addresse of the officers of the Army, to the Parliament of the Common-Wealth of England, &c. Thursday, May 12, 1659. Ordered by the officers of the Army, that this petition and address be forthwith printed and published. Thomas Sandford Secretary.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Henry Hills, for him and Francis Tyton, and are to be sold at the Three Daggers in Fleetstreet,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
